problem.title: CheckPoint: Compressing a Spring
problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) m=lc_choose(a,0.2,0.4,0.8) k=lc_choose(b,200,300,600) v=lc_choose(c,0.6,1.5,2.5)
x= v* math.sqrt( m/ k)
problem.p: A block of mass $m kg slides on a horizontal frictionless table toward a spring with a force constant $k N/m as shown. The block hits the spring at speed $v m/s. How far does the block slide by the time it stops momentarily?
